title: Willie McVie
text:
Willie McVie (born 7 August 1948, in <a href="Glasgow">Glasgow</a>) is a Scottish former footballer.
McVie began his career with <a href="Clyde%20F.C.">Clyde</a>, spending 7 years with the <a href="Shawfield%20Stadium">Shawfield</a> club before joining <a href="Motherwell%20F.C.">Motherwell</a>. He went on to have spells with <a href="Toronto%20Blizzard%20%28NASL%29">Toronto Blizzard</a> in Canada and <a href="Heart%20of%20Midlothian%20F.C.">Heart of Midlothian</a>, before retiring in 1981. He now is a publican in <a href="Larkhall">Larkhall</a>.
